fwdMotors.FwdRelayClient: The pump is an on-board relay
fwdMotors.FwdRelayClient.fwdIsActive: The current state of the pump. true = running
fwdMotors.FwdRelayClient.fwdSetActive: Set the pump to either running or stopped
fwdMotors.FwdRelayClient.fwdTimedRun: Turn the pump on and have it run in the background before turning off.
fwdMotors.FwdRelayClient.fwdTimedRun|par: how long the pump should run for before turning itself off
fwdMotors.FwdServoClient.angleRange: Reports the servo's total range of motion in degrees
fwdMotors.FwdServoClient.fwdGetAngle: Reports what angle the servo is set to
fwdMotors.FwdServoClient.fwdGetSpeed: Reports what speed the servo is set to
fwdMotors.FwdServoClient.fwdIsEnabled: Is the servo enabled or disabled? Enabled = true, disabled = false
fwdMotors.FwdServoClient.fwdSetAngle: Set what angle the servo should point to, and immediately run the next block
fwdMotors.FwdServoClient.fwdSetAngleAndW: Set what angle the servo should point to, and wait for the movement to finish before running the next block
fwdMotors.FwdServoClient.fwdSetEnabled: Set the servo to enabled or disabled
fwdMotors.FwdServoClient.fwdSetSpeed: Set what speed the servo should run at
fwdMotors.FwdServoClient.fwdSetSpeed|par: Can be set between 100% foward and -100% reverse
fwdMotors.fwdPositionPresets: Preset servo positions based on a clock's hour hand
